feed.title: Bechno Kid's Hideout - Web Feed
feed.subtitle: The latest (and greatest?) from a beet disguised as a software engineer.

entry.title: Aug 6, 2025
entry.content:
Hi, everyone! It's almost back to school for some of you! I wish you the best in the school period, whether it's a year, semester, quarter. You can do it!

Still progressing through getting my art gallery ready. I managed to get to 2012! It's...not great, but progress is progress!

Here are the updates for this site!

  • Created a new section, Status Cafe Themes! Not sure if I'll be able to make more themes or just have the one, but we'll see!
    • The Status Cafe Feed Tutorial has also been moved into the same section as the themes. The old links should still work!
  • Added two new cliques to the front page: Barbieland and Miasma.
  • New journal entry, "I'm Not an Ideal Asian", where I discuss my desire for a single crumb of representation as a "non-ideal" Asian American.
  • So many backend fixes, including fixing broken links and other things!

entry.title: Jul 3, 2025
entry.content:
Small update this time around, but I hope everyone has been doing ok! The dreadful heat (and other horrors) persist, but so do I!

Here's what's in this update!

  • Updated the now page
  • Made some fixes and cosmetic changes throughout the site, including making the header and navigation sidebar fixed in place in desktop mode! Viewing them on mobile should have no effect, or at least I hope not!!

entry.title: Jun 21, 2025
entry.content:
It is summer, or...it has been summer already--nevermind! To anyone who recently had their graduation (high school, college, etc.), congratulations to you all! You all worked super hard, unless you used generative AI at any point, but I digress!

Here's what's in this update!

  • Wrote a journal entry on my trip to my wife's home state, Washington!
  • Added some more links!
  • Added some interactive pets in the adopts page! Specifically, they are pets from TamaNOTchi and Wobble Town. I hope you'll help me in taking care of them!
  • Updated the now page!
  • Some minor fixes including fixing the order of the guestbook pages!

entry.title: Jun 4, 2025
entry.content:
Hi, everyone! Happy Pride Month! ‚ú®üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàüè≥Ô∏è‚Äç‚ößÔ∏è‚ú®

Several things for this update!

  • I wrote a rather unhinged review on my thoughts about the Monster Hunter Wilds x Street Fighter collaboration event quest. Spoilers: I didn't like it at all...
  • I added a new pixel club "Objets"!
  • I'm attempting to get my HTML verified, which is embarrassing that I have the "HTML verified" button up, but there are a few errors. It might take a couple more tries, but hey, I'm always learning!
  • I finally got Burning Spice Cookie to join my kingdom, yay!! So, I removed the little widget that was keeping track of how long I've been trying to pull him.

entry.title: May 22, 2025
entry.content:
Hello! I hope everyone is doing alright! It's almost the weekend!

For this update, I added some more links, and I changed the URL for all blog entries. The dates being all bunched up confused me more than anything lol...

I'm also biting the bullet and added some webrings despite not having officially joined them yet! Here I was worred about looking like a desperate fool, and yet I have I added a special widget to the home page to count the days I'm pulling for a cookie in Cookie Run: Kingdom lol.

Burning Spice Cookie, please come to my kingdom!!!

entry.title: May 16, 2025
entry.content:
Lots of new updates this time around!

Major updates:

  • Added a brand new shrine dedicated to one of my favorite Final Fantasy characters!
  • New button! There are also buttons available in 32x32 and 200x40.
  • My RSS feed now looks super fancy, making it easier to read without a feed reader.
  • Microblog and "Latest Status" widget have now been placed by StatusCafe to allow myself to make quick status updates without misleading others into thinking I made a huge update on the site. XD;;
  • Added a button that allows users to scroll to the top of the page. Yes, it is pure CSS. :3
  • Added a pixel club and some links!

Minor updates:

  • Changed the RSS feed icon to its original orange
  • Updated the example code in Status Cafe feed reader tutorial to be a bit more robust
  • Moved fanlistings and webrings into one page called "Joined"

entry.title: Apr 30, 2025
entry.content:
Hi there! I decided to bring back the /now page.

There is also an accessibility statement! I really want to make it clear that I'm trying to make my website as accessible as possible! It won't be perfect, but at least my site works on mobile!

entry.title: Apr 20, 2025
entry.content: Tons of new stuff and fixes this time around! There were also several big mistakes in the example code in the StatusFeed reader tutorial but are now fixed thanks to an email I got :)

entry.title: Apr 12, 2025
entry.content:
Bechno Kid's Hideout has finally joined the dark side and implemented a toggle for dark mode! It's unfortunately not available if JavaScript is disabled...

Perhaps one day, I'll figure out a CSS-only light/dark toggle!
